title: 1 Bed w/Heat Included, Brand New Reno, A Classic Beauty Near Harvard
posting_body: ['1 Bed w/Heat Included, Brand New Reno, A Classic Beauty Not Far From Harvard.', 'Cambridge / Mid Cambridge / Harvard Square', 'Available:', '9/1/2022', '||', '  Fee:', 'Full Fee', '||', '  Reference:', '#171973', 'Apartment Summary', 'Charming and modern!', 'Spacious 1 bedroom in mid-Cambridge.', 'Walk to Harvard Square in 8 minutes.', 'Squeaky clean!', 'Shiny hardwood floors, modern kitchen and bathroom.', 'Heat and hot water are included.', 'Laundry is in the building.', 'Total character and charm apartment with modern touches.', 'Storage unit included.', 'Off street parking might be available, but will be one block away.(Reference #171973)', 'Features', '8 minute walk to the T.', 'Inquire about Off Street Parking.', 'Cats are negotiable with Landlord.', 'Coin-op washer in basement, Coin-op dryer in basement, Cable Ready.', '2 Minutes minute walk to Major Bus Routes.', 'Apartment Details', 'Reference:', '#171973', 'Bedrooms:', '1', 'Fee:', 'Full Fee', 'Location:', 'Cambridge/Mid Cambridge', 'Kitchen:', 'Galley.', ' Appliances include:  Refrigerator, Natural Gas Stove, Dishwasher.', 'Available:', 'September 01, 2022', 'Bath:', '1', 'Contact Information', 'Call:', '857-547-8682', 'Please mention reference #', '171973', 'HUD:', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
